languages.text: "А теперь, дамы и господа, время судьбоносных решений! Высшая милость — вот истинная награда для любого клейменного. Звездное Сиятельство, поведайте же нам, есть ли среди них счастливчик, достойный милости самого Вольного Торговца?"

traits.locale_text: "А теперь, дамы и господа, время судьбоносных решений! Высшая милость — вот истинная награда для любого клейменного. Ваше Сиятельство, поведайте же нам, есть ли среди них счастливчик, достойный милости самого Вольного Торговца?"

languages.text: "And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make the fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your Celestial Highness, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"
languages.original_text: "А теперь, дамы и господа, время судьбоносных решений! Высшая милость — вот истинная награда для любого клейменного. Звездное Сиятельство, поведайте же нам, есть ли среди них счастливчик, достойный милости самого Вольного Торговца?"

traits.locale_text: "And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"

"And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"

"And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make the fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"

"And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make the fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"

"And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make the fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your Celestial Highness, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"

"And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make the fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your Celestial Highness, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"

languages.text: “至于现在，各位女士们、先生们，决定命运的时候到了！所有被打上印记的冒牌货，只有一位能得到真正的奖赏，享受至高无上的青睐。请您告诉我们，来自上界的大人——这些人之中，有没有哪位幸运儿，能得到行商浪人的青睐呢？”
languages.original_text: "And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make the fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your Celestial Highness, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"

traits.locale_text: “至于现在，各位女士们、先生们，决定命运的时候到了！所有被打上印记的冒牌货，只有一位能得到真正的奖赏，享受至高无上的青睐。请您告诉我们，来自上界的大人——这些人之中，有没有哪位幸运儿，能得到行商浪人的青睐呢？”

languages.text: «¡Y ahora, damas y caballeros, ha llegado el momento de tomar las fatídicas decisiones! Únicamente hay una recompensa, el Favor Supremo, que todo impostor marcado ansía. Por favor, Excelencia Celestial, díganos: ¿hay alguien entre estas personas que sea digno del favor {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente?».
languages.original_text: "And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make the fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your Celestial Highness, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Y ahora, damas y caballeros, ha llegado el momento de tomar las fatídicas decisiones! Únicamente hay una recompensa, el Favor Supremo, que todo impostor marcado ansía. Por favor, Excelencia Celestial, díganos: ¿hay alguien entre estas personas que sea digno del favor {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente?».

languages.text: "Zarif lordlar ve leydiler, mukadder kararı vermenin zamanı geldi çattı! Damgalı taklitçiler, Yüce Lütuf'tan başka bir ödülü arzulamaz. Söyler misiniz Semavi Efendimiz, bu insanlar arasında Hür Tacir'in lütfuna layık biri var mıdır?"
languages.original_text: "And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make the fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your Celestial Highness, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"

traits.locale_text: "Zarif lordlar ve leydiler, mukadder kararı vermenin zamanı geldi çattı! Damgalı taklitçiler, Yüce Lütuf'tan başka bir ödülü arzulamaz. Söyler misiniz Semavi Efendimiz, bu insanlar arasında Hür Tacir'in lütfuna layık biri var mıdır?"

languages.text: 「そして、今、紳士淑女のみなさん、運命の決定をするときが来ました！刻印を受けた偽者が望む真の報酬はただ一つ、『最高の恩恵』です。どうか、天の閣下、教えてください。この中にローグトレーダーの恩恵に値する者はいるでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make the fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your Celestial Highness, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"

traits.locale_text: 「そして、今、紳士淑女のみなさん、運命の決定をするときが来ました！刻印を受けた偽者が望む真の報酬はただ一つ、『最高の恩恵』です。どうか、天の閣下、教えてください。この中にローグトレーダーの恩恵に値する者はいるでしょうか？」

languages.text: « Et maintenant, mes dames, mes seigneurs, l'heure est venue de prendre les décisions fatidiques ! Tout imposteur marqué ne désire qu'une seule et unique chose : la Faveur Ultime. Je vous en prie, Votre Altesse Célestissime, dites-nous : y a-t-il parmi ces gens quelqu'un qui soit digne de la faveur {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande} ? »
languages.original_text: "And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make the fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your Celestial Highness, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"

traits.locale_text: « Et maintenant, mes dames, mes seigneurs, l'heure est venue de prendre les décisions fatidiques ! Tout imposteur marqué ne désire qu'une seule et unique chose : la Faveur Ultime. Je vous en prie, Votre Altesse Célestissime, dites-nous : y a-t-il parmi ces gens quelqu'un qui soit digne de la faveur {mf|d'un libre-marchand|d'une libre-marchande} ? »

languages.text: "Und nun, werte Damen und Herren, ist die Zeit für die schicksalhaften Entscheidungen gekommen! Es gibt nur eine wahre Belohnung, die Höchste Gunst, die jeder gebrandmarkte Hochstapler ersehnt. Bitte, Eure himmlische Hoheit, sagt uns: Gibt es unter diesen Leuten jemanden, der der Gunst {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} würdig ist?"
languages.original_text: "And now, good lords and ladies, the time has come to make the fateful decisions! There is naught but one true reward, the Highest Favour, that any branded impostor desires. Please, Your Celestial Highness, tell us: is there among these people one worthy of the Rogue Trader's favour?"
